summary.description:
Discover elevated urban living at Purva Blubelle.
Set across 3.85 acres near Magadi Road, these luxury 3 BHK residences rise gracefully up to 31/32 storeys, offering 80% open spaces and 17 landscaped gardens that bring calm to the heart of the city. Thoughtfully designed homes are complemented by 50+ world-class amenities, including an expansive 8,000 sq. ft. clubhouse, nature-inspired experiences, and dedicated outdoor sports zones.

Located in Rajajinagar, Purva Blubelle blends connectivity, comfort, and contemporary design?creating a refined lifestyle where sophistication meets serenity.
highlights: ?U-rated? private enclave designed for exclusivity, comfort & refined living
Spacious 3 BHK luxury residences with thoughtful layouts
2 elegant high-rise towers rising G+31/32 floors
Vibrant kids? zones for safe, engaging play
Serene wellness parks for relaxation & rejuvenation
Modern co-working spaces for today?s flexible lifestyles
Lifestyle amenities for every age group

aboutBuilder.name: purva

meta.title: About the Developer
meta.subtitle: A trusted name with a proven track record in delivering quality homes
meta.tagline: Built on credibility. Known for consistency.

aboutBuilder.description: Puravankara Limited, headquartered in Bengaluru, is one of India?s most admired and trusted home builders and is recognized among the top real estate companies in India, with a legacy of excellence spanning over 50 years. Founded in 1975, the company is known for delivering high-quality homes on time with complete transparency.
aboutBuilder.descriptionExpanded: Puravankara has launched three prominent brands, each catering to distinct market segments. Puravankara itself is recognized for its luxurious, state-of-the-art projects that incorporate innovative technology to redefine future homes. Provident Housing Ltd., a wholly-owned subsidiary launched in 2008, addresses the needs of mid-income homeowners. Purva Land, established in 2021, offers a lucrative investment opportunity through plotted developments, responding to the evolving needs of homebuyers. Additionally, Starworth Infrastructure and Construction Limited (SICL) provides technology-enabled construction solutions. Puravankara also has a strong presence in commercial office spaces.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.subtitle: Everything you need to know before making a decision

faqs.title: Where is Purva Blubelle located?
items: Purva Blubelle is located near Magadi Road in Rajajinagar, West Bangalore, offering strong connectivity to the city centre, Metro corridors, and major commercial zones.

faqs.title: What type of homes are available at Purva Blubelle?
items: Purva Blubelle offers premium 3 BHK luxury apartments, designed for families seeking privacy, space, and refined urban living.

faqs.title: How large is the project and what is the land area?
items: The project is spread across approximately 3.85 acres, thoughtfully planned with a strong emphasis on open spaces and landscaped zones.

faqs.title: How many towers and floors does Purva Blubelle have?
items: Purva Blubelle comprises 2 multi-storey high-rise towers, rising G+31/32 floors, offering elevated views and exclusivity.

faqs.title: What makes Purva Blubelle unique among luxury apartments in West Bangalore?
items: Key highlights include its ?U-rated? low-density concept, 80% open spaces, 17 landscaped gardens, curated wellness zones, and lifestyle-focused amenities designed for all age groups.

faqs.title: Who is the developer of Purva Blubelle?
items: Purva Blubelle is developed by Puravankara Limited, a trusted real estate brand with over five decades of experience in premium housing.

faqs.title: Is Purva Blubelle suitable for professionals working in central and west Bangalore?
items: Yes. Its Rajajinagar location makes it ideal for professionals working in central, west, and north Bangalore, with easy access to Metro lines and major arterial roads.

faqs.title: What amenities are available at Purva Blubelle?
items: Residents enjoy 50+ world-class amenities including an 8,000 sq. ft. clubhouse, wellness parks, co-working spaces, kids? play zones, outdoor sports areas, and nature-inspired experiences.

faqs.title: What is the price range of apartments at Purva Blubelle?
items: Luxury 3 BHK apartments at Purva Blubelle are priced from ?2.25 Cr onwards*, depending on unit configuration, floor level, and view.

faqs.title: Is Purva Blubelle a good option for long-term investment?
items: Yes. Strong fundamentals include its prime Rajajinagar location, limited supply of luxury high-rise homes in West Bangalore, premium positioning, and strong brand credibility.

faqs.title: Does Purva Blubelle offer good rental potential?
items: Yes. Premium 3 BHK homes in Rajajinagar attract senior professionals, business owners, and families seeking central-city living, supporting steady rental demand.

faqs.title: Is Purva Blubelle RERA approved?
items: Yes. Purva Blubelle is RERA registered, ensuring transparency, legal compliance, and buyer protection as per applicable regulations.

faqs.title: Are these homes suitable for end users or investors?
items: Both. End users benefit from exclusivity, wellness-focused design, and central connectivity, while investors gain from long-term appreciation and rental stability.

faqs.title: How can I book a site visit or get detailed pricing?
items: You can request a guided site visit, get the latest pricing and availability, and receive unbiased assistance through PropYouLike.
